description: Definition of the Payment data model class with JSON serialization capabilities.

classes.name: Payment
classes.description: A model class representing a payment transaction with fields for id, bookingId, amount, status, and method, including JSON serialization support.

methods.name: Payment.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Payment instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Payment.toJson
methods.description: Converts the Payment instance to a JSON map.
